translation.en: BFFs
translation.zh: 闺蜜

translation.en: ♪ Tue-- Tue-- Tuesday My never-be-blues day ♪
translation.zh: 又到了周二 愉快的一天

translation.en: ♪ Kick-off-your-shoes day for... ♪
translation.zh: 轻轻松松享受…

translation.en: Sing it with me, Share. [grunts]
translation.zh: 与我一起唱 分享熊

translation.en: ♪ BFF-picnic Tuesday ♪
translation.zh: 闺蜜周二野餐会

translation.en: Ooh! And the crowd goes wild. [chuckles] Thank you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 大家非常激动 谢谢

translation.en: -I love our BFF Tuesday picnics, Harmony. -Me, too, sweetness.
translation.zh: -我爱闺蜜野餐会 和睦熊 -我也是

translation.en: Okay, have you got your famous Care-a-Lot cookies?
translation.zh: 好的 你的拿手爱心村饼干 带了吗？

translation.en: -Check. -Honey banana musical bars?
translation.zh: -带了 -蜂蜜香蕉音乐棒呢？

translation.en: -Check. -Peanut butter, cranberry sauce,
translation.zh: -带了 -花生酱 蔓越莓酱

translation.en: marshmallow sandwiches sliced diagonally with the crusts off?
translation.zh: 切掉面包皮的 三角形棉花糖三明治呢？

translation.en: Check, check, check. I would never forget my BFF's favorite.
translation.zh: 带了 带了 都带了 我永远 不会忘记我闺蜜最爱的食物

translation.en: And I've got your second favorite and your third favorite,
translation.zh: 我还带了你第二喜欢的 第三喜欢的

translation.en: all the way up to your seventeenth favorite.
translation.zh: 一直到排名第17位的食物

translation.en: Mm! Share, you always remember my favorite foods.
translation.zh: 分享熊 你总是记得 带我最爱吃的食物

translation.en: Now, that's a good friend.
translation.zh: 真是我的好朋友

translation.en: I have lots of friends, Harmony.
translation.zh: 我有很多朋友 和睦熊

translation.en: But Tuesday is my favorite part of the week
translation.zh: 不过周二是一周内 我最开心的一天

translation.en: because it's time I get to share with my BFF.
translation.zh: 因为我可以与我的闺蜜 一起分享那一天

translation.en: Best friends forever.
translation.zh: 我们永远都会是闺蜜

translation.en: I feel the same way, Share.
translation.zh: 我也有同感 分享熊

translation.en: These picnics are special for you and me.
translation.zh: 野餐会对你我而言很特别

translation.en: You're such a good friend that sometimes you know--
translation.zh: 你是我的好朋友 有时候 你甚至…

translation.en: What you're about to say before you say it.
translation.zh: 在你说话前就知道你要说什么

translation.en: -That's why we're BFFs and-- -Always will be.
translation.zh: -所以我们是闺蜜 而且 -我们永远都会是闺蜜

translation.en: -To the Forest of Feelings, BFF. -Lead the way.
translation.zh: -向感情森林前进 闺蜜 -带路

translation.en: ♪ Tuesday, Tuesday Never-be-blues day ♪
translation.zh: 又到了周二 愉快的一天

translation.en: Wait a second, Share.
translation.zh: 等等 分享熊

translation.en: Something's going on.
translation.zh: 有情况

translation.en: Harmony! We need your help. It's a harmonic emergency.
translation.zh: 和睦熊！我们需要你帮忙 事关乐器的紧急情况

translation.en: Heh. More of a uke emergency.
translation.zh: 更像是事关尤克里里琴的 紧急情况

translation.en: See? 'Cause there's a ukulele stuck on his foot? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 明白了吗？因为他的脚上 卡着一把尤克里里琴？

translation.en: That's definitely a uke emergency.
translation.zh: 绝对是尤克里里琴紧急情况

translation.en: Oh, you think that's bad?
translation.zh: 你们以为那样就算糟糕了吗？

translation.en: Oh, sure, go ahead, laugh at my uke emergency.
translation.zh: 好吧 笑吧 笑我的尤克里里琴紧急情况

translation.en: Grumpy, Tenderheart and I were rehearsing our ukulele band
translation.zh: 我 易怒熊和娇柔熊组成的 尤克里里琴乐队正在彩排

translation.en: and having a jamming time.
translation.zh: 即兴演奏

translation.en: But then Brave Heart, Bright Heart and Wonderheart came along
translation.zh: 可是勇敢狮 聪明浣熊 和好奇熊

translation.en: collecting Care Hearts, and, well...
translation.zh: 跑过来收集爱心 然后…

translation.en: Brave Heart went this way...
translation.zh: 勇敢狮向这个方向跑…

translation.en: While Wonder went that way...
translation.zh: 而好奇熊向那个方向跑…

translation.en: -Making Brighto go that way. -And then:
translation.zh: -害聪明浣熊飞向上空 -接着

translation.en: Definitely sounds like they need me, Share.
translation.zh: 他们确实需要我帮忙 分享熊

translation.en: Would it be terrible if we put off our picnic for today?
translation.zh: 今天的野餐可以延期吗？

translation.en: Oh, heh, that's okay.
translation.zh: 哦…好吧

translation.en: After all, only you can repair a uke emergency. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 毕竟只有你能处理 尤克里里琴紧急情况

translation.en: Sorry, Share. Harmonic emergencies wait for no bear.
translation.zh: 对不起 分享熊 乐器紧急情况不等熊的

translation.en: Even BFFs. But we'll do our picnic next week, okay?
translation.zh: 哪怕是闺蜜 我们下周再野餐 好吗？

translation.en: Next week. Sure.
translation.zh: 下周 好吧

translation.en: Oh, it's nothing, Cozy.
translation.zh: 我没事 暖心企鹅

translation.en: Just that... well, I was supposed to go on a picnic with Harmony today,
translation.zh: 只是…我今天本该 与和睦熊野餐

translation.en: and she had to cancel.
translation.zh: 她临时有事 取消了我们的约会

translation.en: It is a lovely picnic. I packed it specially for me and my BFF.
translation.zh: 确实是美味的野餐 我特别为我和我的闺蜜准备的

translation.en: And now I don't know what to do with it.
translation.zh: 现在我不知道 该怎么处理它们了

translation.en: I mean, it's already packed and ready.
translation.zh: 我是说 野餐篮都收拾好了

translation.en: I shouldn't let it go to waste. Someone should eat it, right?
translation.zh: 我不该浪费这些食物 应该有人把它们吃掉 对吗？

translation.en: Hey, why not us?
translation.zh: 不如我们去野餐吧？

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Unless you're busy today...
translation.zh: 除非你今天有事…

translation.en: Then let's go to the Forest of Feelings. You're gonna love this place.
translation.zh: 和我去感情森林吧 你会爱上那里的

translation.en: -Almost there. Are you ready? [Cozy chirps]
translation.zh: 快到了 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Here... it... is.
translation.zh: 就…在…这…里

translation.en: Harmony and I discovered this secluded spot.
translation.zh: 我与和睦熊一起发现了 这个秘密花园

translation.en: It's the most amazing place in the whole Forest of Feelings,
translation.zh: 这是感情森林里 景色最美的一处

translation.en: and nobody else has ever seen it.
translation.zh: 没有其他人来过这里

translation.en: Until now.
translation.zh: 直到现在

translation.en: Time for the best picnic ever.
translation.zh: 是时候享受最美味野餐了

translation.en: To get to the other side?
translation.zh: 到另一边？

translation.en: That's hilarious, Cozy.
translation.zh: 真好笑 暖心企鹅

translation.en: [Harmony] Share? -Huh?
translation.zh: 分享熊？

translation.en: Restringing and tuning all those ukuleles was challenging.
translation.zh: 给那么多尤克里里琴换琴弦 调音 真是巨大挑战

translation.en: But thanks to Harmony, our ukuleles are fixed,
translation.zh: 多亏了和睦熊修好了 我们的尤克里里琴

translation.en: and they sound totally radical.
translation.zh: 弹奏起来好听极了

translation.en: Well, they will. Really. Heh.
translation.zh: 真的会很好听的

translation.en: I just haven't learned how to play the song yet.
translation.zh: 我只是还没学会弹那首曲子

translation.en: Guess we'd better get back to our jam session. Later.
translation.zh: 我们最好回去即兴演奏了 待会见

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you were able to fix your harmonic uke emergency.
translation.zh: 你能解决尤克里里琴紧急情况 我很高兴

translation.en: Yes, and it didn't take as long as I expected.
translation.zh: 对 花的时间比预期要短

translation.en: I got back as fast as I could
translation.zh: 我尽快赶回来了

translation.en: so we could go on our Tuesday no-blues-day
translation.zh: 这样我们可以继续

translation.en: kick-off-your-shoes-day picnic after all.
translation.zh: 我们的愉快轻松周二野餐了

translation.en: That's okay, Harmony. I already went on the picnic.
translation.zh: 不用了 和睦熊 我已经吃过野餐了

translation.en: Wait. You went on the picnic? Alone?
translation.zh: 等等 你吃过野餐了？ 一个人去的吗？

translation.en: Nope. I brought Cozy along.
translation.zh: 不是的 我带暖心企鹅去的

translation.en: Oh. Oh, right. Of course you did.
translation.zh: 好吧 当然会是这样

translation.en: After all, I did say I couldn't go, so... why wouldn't you go?
translation.zh: 毕竟我说我去不了 所以你们为什么不能去？

translation.en: Yes. And don't worry, I still had a great time without you.
translation.zh: 对 不用担心 你没去 我还是玩得很愉快

translation.en: Uh... Worry?
translation.zh: 担心？

translation.en: I know you probably were concerned that I would be disappointed.
translation.zh: 我知道你也许担心我会失望

translation.en: But Cozy and I had a blast. Right, Cozy?
translation.zh: 不过我和暖心企鹅玩得很开心 对吗 暖心企鹅？

translation.en: So, you had fun, huh?
translation.zh: 你们玩得很开心？

translation.en: But was it as fun as when you and I spilled all that honey over our food?
translation.zh: 有没有那次有趣？我们俩 将那么多蜂蜜泼在食物上？

translation.en: [laughs] And we...
translation.zh: 我们…

translation.en: We ended up having a huge honey feast?
translation.zh: 我们最后吃了一顿蜂蜜大餐

translation.en: Oh, much more fun.
translation.zh: 这次有趣多了

translation.en: We had carrot-stick mustaches.
translation.zh: 我们将胡萝卜条当胡须 贴在嘴上

translation.en: How fun is that?
translation.zh: 好玩吧

translation.en: Well, what about the time we sang "Row Your Boat"
translation.zh: 那次我们放开嗓子

translation.en: at the top of our lungs, huh?
translation.zh: 高歌《划船歌》呢？

translation.en: That was fun, but listen to this:
translation.zh: 那次很有趣 不过听我们的

translation.en: Well, I guess you have a new BFF.
translation.zh: 看来你找到了一位新闺蜜

translation.en: Ugh. What is this?
translation.zh: 这是什么东西？

translation.en: I cannot believe she just went with Cozy Heart Penguin.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 她竟然和暖心企鹅去野餐了

translation.en: I mean, some BFF she is.
translation.zh: 她可真是好闺蜜

translation.en: That's our special place.
translation.zh: 那是我们的特别野餐地

translation.en: [groans] Breathe, girl.
translation.zh: 深呼吸

translation.en: Well, unless it's on a stage, Harmony is not about to be a solo artist.
translation.zh: 除了在舞台上 乖乖不愿形单影只

translation.en: Solo artist?
translation.zh: 形单影只？

translation.en: Oh. Sorry, Lotsa.
translation.zh: 对不起 博爱象

translation.en: I was just thinking to myself that I might need a new BFF.
translation.zh: 我只是想着 也许我需要一位新闺蜜

translation.en: Oh. Well, I'll be your BFF.
translation.zh: 我愿意做你的闺蜜

translation.en: What's a BFF?
translation.zh: 闺蜜是什么意思？

translation.en: Best friend forever. [gasps]
translation.zh: 永远的好友

translation.en: And you would be a great one, Lottie.
translation.zh: 你会成为好闺蜜的 博爱象

translation.en: Hey, how would you like to go on a picnic with me?
translation.zh: 对了 你想和我野餐吗？

translation.en: We'll have food and music and flowers and fun, fun, fun.
translation.zh: 我们会吃美食 唱歌 摘花 我们会玩得非常愉快

translation.en: We could do it tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我们可以明天去

translation.en: A picnic tomorrow? Sure.
translation.zh: 明天去野餐？当然可以

translation.en: -What's the occasion? -Occasion?
translation.zh: -明天是什么特殊的日子？ -特殊的日子？

translation.en: Well, because...
translation.zh: 那个 因为…

translation.en: it's Wednesday.
translation.zh: 明天是周三

translation.en: Yes. And I just decided that is my new special day.
translation.zh: 没错 我刚刚决定 周三是我的新特殊日子

translation.en: ♪ Wednesday, Wednesday That's my best-friends day ♪
translation.zh: 周三 周三 那是我的闺蜜日

translation.en: Best friend. Oh, that's so nice.
translation.zh: 最好的朋友 真好

translation.en: -I've never had a BFF be-- -Before.
translation.zh: -我从没有过… -闺蜜

translation.en: See? We finish each other's sentences.
translation.zh: 看见了吗？ 我们能接上对方的话

translation.en: It's just like we've been BFFs forever. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 就好像我们做了很久的闺蜜

translation.en: Tomorrow's gonna be the best picnic in Care Bear history.
translation.zh: 明天会是爱心小熊历史上 最精彩的野餐

translation.en: You know, I'm always full of lots of love,
translation.zh: 你知道 我总是充满爱

translation.en: but, wow, Harmony,
translation.zh: 不过 和睦熊

translation.en: you really know how to make a friend feel welcome.
translation.zh: 你真的让我感觉自己很受欢迎

translation.en: I can't wait.
translation.zh: 我等不及了

translation.en: Oh, hey, did you guys just go on a picnic, too?
translation.zh: 你们好 你们刚刚 也去野餐了吗？

translation.en: Yep, and then we sledded down in the picnic basket.
translation.zh: 对 然后我们坐在野餐篮里 滑下来

translation.en: We did have the best time, huh, Cozy?
translation.zh: 我们确实玩得很愉快 对吗 暖心企鹅？

translation.en: That sounds so fun.
translation.zh: 听上去很有趣

translation.en: And I can't wait to do some of those things, too.
translation.zh: 我等不及也想去玩了

translation.en: Because guess what.
translation.zh: 因为 你们猜猜看

translation.en: I'm going on a picnic tomorrow with my new BFF.
translation.zh: 我明天要和我的新闺蜜野餐了

translation.en: -Who's your new BFF? -Harmony.
translation.zh: -谁是你的新闺蜜？ -和睦熊

translation.en: Harmony is going on a picnic with someone other than me?
translation.zh: 和睦熊不找我 却和其他人野餐？

translation.en: Lousy bush.
translation.zh: 讨厌的灌木丛

translation.en: [gasps] Cozy!
translation.zh: 暖心企鹅

translation.en: We had such a good time today...
translation.zh: 我们今天玩得很愉快

translation.en: I think we ought to have another picnic tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我认为我们应该明天再去野餐

translation.en: And I know it's going to be way better than Harmony's picnic.
translation.zh: 我知道我们的野餐 一定会比和睦熊的好多了

translation.en: What do you say, new BFF?
translation.zh: 你同意吗 新闺蜜？

translation.en: Now let's see...
translation.zh: 让我想想看…

translation.en: We've got to make sure we have the best new treats.
translation.zh: 我们得带上最美味的新式点心

translation.en: I'll start baking tonight.
translation.zh: 我今晚就开始烘焙

translation.en: Share would always pack tasty treats for her picnic,
translation.zh: 分享熊总是会带上美味的点心

translation.en: but she never had these special things in her basket.
translation.zh: 不过她的野餐篮里 不会有这些特别的东西

translation.en: Ukulele? Check.
translation.zh: 尤克里里琴？带了

translation.en: Trumpet? Check.
translation.zh: 喇叭？带了！

translation.en: Mini drum kit?
translation.zh: 整套迷你鼓？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Checkity check and check and check.
translation.zh: 好的 带了 带了 都带了

translation.en: Share's picnic basket may have been full of tastiness,
translation.zh: 分享熊的野餐篮 也许装满了美食

translation.en: but mine's full of harmoniousness.
translation.zh: 不过我的野餐篮里 全是动听的旋律

translation.en: Hey, hey, Harmony.
translation.zh: 你好 和睦熊

translation.en: Look, I picked a beautiful bouquet of flowers, just like you asked.
translation.zh: 看啊 我按你的要求 摘了一束美丽的花

translation.en: Oh! Thank you, Cheer.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 欢乐熊

translation.en: They're the perfect addition to my picnic basket
translation.zh: 它们正适合用来装饰

translation.en: for me and my new BFF, Lottie.
translation.zh: 我和我的新闺蜜博爱象 要用的野餐篮

translation.en: That is some picnic basket you got there, Harmony.
translation.zh: 你的野餐篮真不错 和睦熊

translation.en: Flowers, musical instruments...
translation.zh: 花 乐器…

translation.en: It's like a party in a basket.
translation.zh: 就像野餐篮里的派对

translation.en: Huh-huh. Party in a basket. Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 野餐篮里的派对

translation.en: Isn't it great?
translation.zh: 是不是很棒？

translation.en: I mean, have you ever seen a picnic basket as good as that?
translation.zh: 你见过这么好的野餐篮吗？

translation.en: You know, my old BFF, Share,
translation.zh: 你知道 我的前闺蜜分享熊

translation.en: yeah, she never packed one like this.
translation.zh: 对 她从没有准备过 这样的野餐篮

translation.en: Huh? Old BFF?
translation.zh: 前闺蜜？

translation.en: Oh, nothing.
translation.zh: 那不重要

translation.en: I'm just glad that you like it, Cheer.
translation.zh: 你喜欢我的野餐篮 我真高兴 欢乐熊

translation.en: In fact, how would you like to go with Lottie and me
translation.zh: 你明天想与我和博爱象

translation.en: on a picnic tomorrow?
translation.zh: 去野餐吗？

translation.en: Oh. Really? Me?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你邀我？

translation.en: I would love, love, L-U-V, love to.
translation.zh: 我很乐意 非常乐意

translation.en: Oh. But if you and Lottie are going alone, then I wouldn't wanna cramp your style.
translation.zh: 不过如果你想和博爱象独处 那么我就不想打扰你们

translation.en: Are you kidding?
translation.zh: 你开玩笑吗？

translation.en: The more BFFs, the better. Come on along.
translation.zh: 闺蜜越多越好 记得要来啊

translation.en: Really? [chuckles] Okay, great. Go, picnic!
translation.zh: 真的吗？好极了 一起野餐

translation.en: Snapricot scones? Check.
translation.zh: 斯耐普杏烤饼？带了

translation.en: Bumbleberry Bundt cake? Check.
translation.zh: 邦波莓蛋糕？带了

translation.en: I thought I'd seen the most lovely picnic basket of them all,
translation.zh: 我以为我之前见到的野餐篮 是最美的

translation.en: but now I'm thinking I was wrong.
translation.zh: 不过我现在觉得我错了

translation.en: I made it especially for my new BFF.
translation.zh: 我特地为我的新闺蜜准备的

translation.en: I have matching blanket and linens
translation.zh: 我带了相配的地毯和亚麻餐布

translation.en: and of course, the biggest assortment of goodies I've ever made.
translation.zh: 当然还有我做的美食 这次准备的种类最多最齐全

translation.en: Doesn't it look delicious?
translation.zh: 是不是看上去很美味？

translation.en: Mm-mm! Yummy. It sure does.
translation.zh: 好吃 确实看上去很美味

translation.en: Cheer, you should totally join us at our picnic tomorrow.
translation.zh: 欢乐熊 你明天应该 与我们一起去野餐

translation.en: Oh, this basket is for tomorrow's picnic?
translation.zh: 这是为了明天的野餐准备的？

translation.en: I already know all about it. And of course. I'll be there.
translation.zh: 我已经听说了 当然了 我会去的

translation.en: Wait, you knew? How did you--? Oh, never mind.
translation.zh: 等等 你知道了？ 你怎么会…不管了

translation.en: Meet us in the Forest of Feelings.
translation.zh: 感情森林见

translation.en: We'll have so much fun. The more BFFs, the better.
translation.zh: 我们会玩得很开心的 闺蜜越多越好

translation.en: Almost there. Are you ready?
translation.zh: 快到了 你准备好了吗？

translation.en: Here... it... is.
translation.zh: 就…在…这…里

translation.en: Share? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 分享熊？你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Having a new-BFF picnic. What are you doing?
translation.zh: 和新闺蜜野餐 你在做什么？

translation.en: I'm having a new-BFF picnic.
translation.zh: 和新闺蜜野餐

translation.en: -Come on, new BFF. -Come on, new BFF.
translation.zh: -来吧 新闺蜜 -来吧 新闺蜜

translation.en: Look, Lottie, this is the perfect place for our musical picnic.
translation.zh: 看啊 博爱象 这里正适合 供我们享受音乐野餐

translation.en: Oh, Cozy, let's enjoy our delectable-delights picnic here,
translation.zh: 暖心企鹅 我们在这里 享用我们美味可口的野餐

translation.en: where the light is just right.
translation.zh: 光线强度刚刚好

translation.en: Wow, Share, your picnic blanket sure is beautiful.
translation.zh: 天啊 分享熊 你的野餐毯真漂亮

translation.en: Lottie. Look at our picnic's perfect floral display.
translation.zh: 博爱象 看看我们野餐篮里的 美丽花束

translation.en: Yes, it's very... fascinating.
translation.zh: 没错 确实非常…迷人

translation.en: Isn't it wonderful how at our picnic,
translation.zh: 我们的野餐是不是很棒

translation.en: the blanket and the napkins all match, Cozy?
translation.zh: 地毯和纸巾都是配套的 对不对 暖心企鹅？

translation.en: Eating is so much more fun to the sweet sounds of music,
translation.zh: 边演奏乐器边吃东西更有趣

translation.en: wouldn't you agree, Lottie?
translation.zh: 对不对 博爱象？

translation.en: Well, yeah...
translation.zh: 是这样的吧…

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: [grunts] But the best thing about this picnic
translation.zh: 不过这次野餐的最大优点是

translation.en: is I get to share it with my BFF, Cozy.
translation.zh: 我可以与我的闺蜜暖心企鹅 一起分享

translation.en: Well, the great thing about my picnic
translation.zh: 我的野餐最大优点是

translation.en: is that I'm in perfect harmony with my BFF, Lottie.
translation.zh: 我与我的闺蜜博爱象相处和睦

translation.en: Say, Harmony, this is fun and all...
translation.zh: 和睦熊 这样很有意思…

translation.en: but, uh, look at all these instruments.
translation.zh: 可是这里有这么多乐器

translation.en: What if we all play some music together?
translation.zh: 我们一起演奏音乐怎么样？

translation.en: What do you think, Cozy?
translation.zh: 你同意吗 暖心企鹅？

translation.en: What? No. Why would you wanna do that?
translation.zh: 什么？不行 你为什么 想和她们一起演奏音乐？

translation.en: Aren't you having fun with just me?
translation.zh: 你和我野餐不开心吗？

translation.en: No, let's not do that, Cozy.
translation.zh: 不行 我们不要做那种事 暖心企鹅

translation.en: We have so many other fun things going on, we won't have time to join their picnic.
translation.zh: 我们有很多好玩的事要做 没时间加入她们的野餐会

translation.en: Aw. Come on, you two.
translation.zh: 你们俩不要闹了

translation.en: Can we just remember how much we all love, love, love each other?
translation.zh: 你们不记得 我们都超级爱对方吗？

translation.en: Wait, Cozy.
translation.zh: 等等 暖心企鹅

translation.en: That picnic doesn't have the sweet treats our picnic has.
translation.zh: 那边的野餐可没有 我们这边的美食

translation.en: Oh, Lottie, you gotta check out the rest of the great instruments I brought
translation.zh: 博爱象 你得看看 我为我们的野餐

translation.en: for our picnic.
translation.zh: 准备的其余乐器

translation.en: -Okay, what are all these weird bushes? -They're growing all over the place.
translation.zh: -这些奇怪灌木丛是什么？ -它们都快长满了

translation.en: Hello, guys? I'm so sorry I'm late. But I'm here for the pic...
translation.zh: 你们在哪里？对不起我迟到了 不过我来参加…

translation.en: ...nic.
translation.zh: 野餐会

translation.en: Cheer, we are so glad you're here.
translation.zh: 欢乐熊 你来了真好

translation.en: Share and Harmony are--
translation.zh: 分享熊与和睦熊正在…

translation.en: Cheer, you made it. Come on over and join the fun on our side. Ah!
translation.zh: 欢乐熊 你来了 到我们这边 和我们一起开心野餐

translation.en: If you're joining the fun, you should be coming over here.
translation.zh: 如果你想开心野餐 你应该来这边

translation.en: I invited Cheer.
translation.zh: 是我邀请的欢乐熊

translation.en: Uh, I'm the one who invited her.
translation.zh: 是我邀请她的

translation.en: Actually, both of you invited me.
translation.zh: 实际上 你们俩都邀请了我

translation.en: But I thought it was supposed to be one big picnic.
translation.zh: 不过我以为大家是一起野餐

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no, Cheer.
translation.zh: 不 不 不是的 欢乐熊

translation.en: I invited you because our picnic is too awesome for just two, okay?
translation.zh: 我邀请你是因为我们的野餐会 太好了 两个闺蜜不够

translation.en: We need three BFFs
translation.zh: 我们需要三个闺蜜

translation.en: to complete the awesomeness that's happening over here.
translation.zh: 一起享受这边的乐趣

translation.en: Uh, if you want an awesomest extraordinary three-BFF picnicking experience, Cheer,
translation.zh: 如果你想享受最精彩 最愉快的三闺蜜野餐 欢乐熊

translation.en: step right over here.
translation.zh: 到这边来

translation.en: [Cheer] Okay. Oh, my. Wait a second.
translation.zh: 好吧 我的天 等等

translation.en: Girls, listen. You've got to stop this.
translation.zh: 女孩们 听我说 你们得停下来

translation.en: Oh, no. Harmony? Share? Cozy? Lottie?
translation.zh: 糟了 和睦熊？分享熊？ 暖心企鹅？博爱象？

translation.en: I can't even see you.
translation.zh: 我都看不见你们了

translation.en: How am I ever going to get my friends out of there?
translation.zh: 我该怎么做 才能救出我的朋友？

translation.en: What are Jealouspikle Junipers doing here?
translation.zh: 妒忌尖刺杜松怎么会在这里？

translation.en: Ah. Let's see.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: They seem to go right... over...
translation.zh: 它们似乎一直蔓延到…

translation.en: Ow! Hey, watch where you're...
translation.zh: 小心点 你…

translation.en: uh, standing.
translation.zh: 站哪儿呢

translation.en: Hi, Beastly.
translation.zh: 你好 魔兽

translation.en: Well, what are you looking at?
translation.zh: 你在看什么？

translation.en: No big deal, Cozy.
translation.zh: 没什么大不了的 暖心企鹅

translation.en: Our friendship is so strong, nothing can ruin our time together.
translation.zh: 我们的友谊非常牢固 什么都 无法破坏我们的美好时光

translation.en: Not even a bunch of weird, sharp, bitter-smelling bushes.
translation.zh: 哪怕是一堆长相奇怪 边缘锋利 气味苦涩的灌木丛

translation.en: Harmony, are we gonna do something about this?
translation.zh: 和睦熊 我们不想想办法吗？

translation.en: You bet, Lottie.
translation.zh: 没错 博爱象

translation.en: This is a story we're gonna tell each other for years to come and laugh.
translation.zh: 多年后 我们还会想起 今天的趣事 开怀大笑

translation.en: [laughs] Remember that time those crazy spiky bushes
translation.zh: 记得那次吗？ 那些疯狂的尖刺灌木

translation.en: tried to attack our BFF picnic?
translation.zh: 试图破坏我们的闺蜜野餐会？

translation.en: Not that I care,
translation.zh: 虽说我不太关心

translation.en: but how did those four get stuck in the Jealouspikle Junipers?
translation.zh: 不过那四个家伙怎么会 被困在妒忌尖刺杜松里的？

translation.en: Jealouspikle Junipers? Is that what these things are?
translation.zh: 妒忌尖刺杜松？ 这就是妒忌尖刺杜松吗？

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: I'm bitter and jealous all the time,
translation.zh: 我心里总是充满怨恨和妒忌

translation.en: so, I've practically got a whole Jealouspikle garden. Mm.
translation.zh: 所以我有一个 妒忌尖刺杜松花园

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: You've got some major jealousy going on over here.
translation.zh: 这里飘着浓郁的妒忌气味

translation.en: But why are they growing right here?
translation.zh: 不过它们为什么会长在这里？

translation.en: Well, Cheer Bear, like all plants,
translation.zh: 欢乐熊 妒忌尖刺杜松

translation.en: Jealouspikle Junipers grow out of the ground.
translation.zh: 和所有植物一样 从土里长出来

translation.en: But instead of growing from water and sunlight,
translation.zh: 不过它们不需要水和阳光

translation.en: these bushes grow from feelings of jealousy.
translation.zh: 这些灌木丛靠妒忌汲取营养

translation.en: -Jealousy, huh? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -妒忌吗？ -没错

translation.en: And once you're a little jealous, that jealousy feeds on more jealousy.
translation.zh: 一旦有人产生一点妒忌心理 灌木丛就会吸收妒忌

translation.en: All it takes is a little bit, and it grows and grows
translation.zh: 只需要一点点 它就能不断长大

translation.en: and grows and grows and grows!
translation.zh: 长大 长大 再长大

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa. Wait.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: Those Jealouspikle Junipers are dividing my friends from each other even more.
translation.zh: 那些妒忌尖刺杜松 把我的朋友们隔得更远了

translation.en: [chuckles] It's probably too late to save them.
translation.zh: 也许来不及救她们了

translation.en: The only spot left with no Jealouspikle Junipers
translation.zh: 只有中间

translation.en: is right in the middle.
translation.zh: 没长妒忌尖刺杜松

translation.en: And that's exactly what they need to do: meet in the middle.
translation.zh: 她们只需要在中间会合

translation.en: Hoorays o'clock. Go, Beastly. Go, Beastly.
translation.zh: 太好了 魔兽 真棒 魔兽 真棒

translation.en: Come on, you did it. You figured it out.
translation.zh: 你做到了 你想出解决办法了

translation.en: Give me some love, Beasters. Come on, bring it in. Bring it in.
translation.zh: 献出你的爱吧 魔兽 来吧

translation.en: Hey! Hands off the merchandise.
translation.zh: 注意点 别碰我

translation.en: What do you think this is, a petting zoo? Gross!
translation.zh: 你以为这里是宠物乐园吗？ 恶心

translation.en: Ooh, ooh! Harmony. Share. Please stop.
translation.zh: 和睦熊 分享熊 请停下来

translation.en: These bushes are Jealouspikle Junipers, and they are being created by you.
translation.zh: 这些灌木是妒忌尖刺杜松 它们是你们创造出来的

translation.en: -Us? -Us?
translation.zh: -我们？ -我们？

translation.en: Yes with a double S-S. You.
translation.zh: 完全正确 就是你们

translation.en: You're both jealous of each other and your new friendships.
translation.zh: 你们都嫉妒对方找到新朋友

translation.en: Please. That's ridiculous.
translation.zh: 拜托 太荒唐了

translation.en: I am not jealous.
translation.zh: 我没有嫉妒

translation.en: Even though you seem way happier without me as your BFF,
translation.zh: 即使我不做你的闺蜜 你似乎更开心

translation.en: but you know, whatevs.
translation.zh: 不过那也没什么

translation.en: Pashaw. Me either. I'm totally fine.
translation.zh: 我也没有嫉妒 我完全不介意

translation.en: Although you seem perfectly delighted now that I'm not your BFF.
translation.zh: 虽然我不做你的闺蜜 你似乎很高兴

translation.en: Well, bears, something is causing these Junipers to grow.
translation.zh: 爱心小熊们 肯定有什么 导致这些杜松长得如此茂密

translation.en: Are you sure you're not feeling a little eensy-beensy-weensy bit jealous?
translation.zh: 你们真的没有一点点嫉妒吗？

translation.en: Well, I guess it did make me feel bad
translation.zh: 我猜分享熊带暖心企鹅 到我们的野餐地

translation.en: when Share took Cozy to our special picnic place.
translation.zh: 我确实有点难过

translation.en: I kind of didn't want her to be happy, which made me feel even worse.
translation.zh: 我有点不希望她玩得开心 这种想法令我更难过

translation.en: And I was afraid that Harmony would become better friends with Lottie than with me.
translation.zh: 我害怕和睦熊会和博爱象 关系更亲密

translation.en: That made me feel afraid that I was losing my friend.
translation.zh: 我害怕我会失去我的朋友

translation.en: Jealousy makes you feel that way.
translation.zh: 妒忌心令你们产生那些想法

translation.en: And that's why these bushes grew and pushed you two bears apart.
translation.zh: 所以这些灌木丛不断生长 将你们俩隔得更远

translation.en: But you can fix things by getting back together.
translation.zh: 不过你们能改变现状 只要和好就行了

translation.en: Oh, come on, Share.
translation.zh: 拜托 分享熊

translation.en: Are we gonna let a few Jealouspikle Junipers get in the way
translation.zh: 我们要让一些妒忌尖刺杜松

translation.en: of our friendship?
translation.zh: 阻碍我们的友谊吗？

translation.en: -That smarts. -Oh, no, Harmony.
translation.zh: -真痛 -糟了 和睦熊

translation.en: I'm sorry I let jealousy come between us.
translation.zh: 我不该让嫉妒破坏我们的友谊 对不起

translation.en: You know that I'll always be your BFF. [gasps]
translation.zh: 你知道我一直都会是你的闺蜜

translation.en: Me, too, Share.
translation.zh: 我也是这么想的 分享熊

translation.en: And I'm sorry I didn't tell you I was inviting Lottie today.
translation.zh: 我没告诉你 我今天 邀请了博爱象 对不起

translation.en: It doesn't mean that I don't love our special time together, too.
translation.zh: 但是我也很喜欢 我们俩的特别时光

translation.en: This is great.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: You guys, the Jealouspikle Junipers need jealousy to grow,
translation.zh: 妒忌尖刺杜松需要嫉妒情绪 才能生长

translation.en: but when you feel less jealous, they go away.
translation.zh: 当你们不再嫉妒了 它们就会消失

translation.en: Keep going. Go, go, go.
translation.zh: 继续努力 加油

translation.en: Well, I'm actually glad now that we found new friends.
translation.zh: 我们找到了新朋友 我实际上很高兴

translation.en: And knowing we will always have our special memories, too,
translation.zh: 想到我们永远都会拥有 我们的特别回忆

translation.en: makes me feel less jealous.
translation.zh: 我就没那么嫉妒了

translation.en: Yeah. Having Lottie and Cozy here with us just makes it more fun.
translation.zh: 对 博爱象和暖心企鹅 与我们野餐 野餐更有趣了

translation.en: We can all eat and play music.
translation.zh: 我们可以一起吃美食 演奏乐器

translation.en: -Aw, I missed you, Harmony. -I missed you, too, Share.
translation.zh: -我想你 和睦熊 -我也想你 分享熊

translation.en: Look, you did it. You're out.
translation.zh: 你们瞧 你们做到了 你们出来了

translation.en: Cozy and I didn't know you were jealous because of us.
translation.zh: 我和暖心企鹅不知道你们 是因为我们而产生妒忌心

translation.en: We don't wanna come between you.
translation.zh: 我们不想破坏你们的感情

translation.en: Oh, no, Lottie, Cozy, you guys are the greatest.
translation.zh: 不是的 博爱象 暖心企鹅 你们最好了

translation.en: Having new friends shouldn't take anything away from our old friends.
translation.zh: 结交新朋友之后 你和老朋友之间的友谊并没变

translation.en: We know now that it doesn't mean our old friends are any less special.
translation.zh: 我们现在知道 那并不意味着 我们的友谊不再特别

translation.en: We love you.
translation.zh: 我们爱你们

translation.en: Now that we're all back together,
translation.zh: 既然我们和好了

translation.en: let's make one big blanket for our group picnic.
translation.zh: 我们把毯子拼起来 一起野餐吧

translation.en: Oh, and set out all the food together. And the flowers.
translation.zh: 把所有食物和花朵摆出来

translation.en: Each of us can play an instrument in the band.
translation.zh: 每人都可以演奏一种乐器

translation.en: We did it. Let's have some fun.
translation.zh: 搞定 大家一起享受吧

translation.en: Hey, Share, you know what today is?
translation.zh: 分享熊 你知道 今天是什么日子吗？

translation.en: -♪ Tue-- Tue-- Tuesday ♪ -♪ My never-be-blues day ♪
translation.zh: -又到了周二 -愉快的一天

translation.en: ♪ Kick-off-your-shoes day For BFF-picnic Tuesday ♪
translation.zh: 轻轻松松享受闺蜜周二野餐会

translation.en: I've already told Cozy and Lottie to meet us there.
translation.zh: 我已通知了暖心企鹅和博爱象 让她们去那里等我们

translation.en: So, what do you say? Should we go?
translation.zh: 怎么说？可以走了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, let me guess.
translation.zh: 好吧 好吧 让我猜猜

translation.en: -Ka-sproink? -[grunts] How'd you know?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道的？

translation.en: Listen, Grumpy and Funshine,
translation.zh: 易怒熊和活力熊 听我说

translation.en: I wanna help you again, but Tuesday is BFF-picnic day,
translation.zh: 我很想再帮你们一次 不过周二是闺蜜野餐日

translation.en: and I will not miss it again this week.
translation.zh: 我这周不要再错过了

translation.en: -Oh. -Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: But you two could join us on the picnic.
translation.zh: 不过你们俩可以 与我们一起野餐

translation.en: And I bet we could fix those ukuleles up really nicely on the way.
translation.zh: 我肯定我们能在路上 修好那些尤克里里琴

translation.en: -Fixed ukes? -And a picnic?
translation.zh: -修好的尤克里里琴？ -还有野餐？
